00023         void StrUtils::tokenize(const std::string& subject, const std::string& delimeters,
00024                                                                                                         std::vector<std::string>& out) {
00025     const char* delims = delimeters.c_str();
00026                 std::string::size_type begin = subject.find_first_not_of(delims);
00027                 std::string::size_type end = subject.find_first_of(delims, begin);
00028     while (true) {
00029                         if (begin != string::npos) {
00030                                 if (end != string::npos) {
00031                                         out.push_back(subject.substr(begin, end - begin));
00032                                         begin = subject.find_first_not_of(delims, end);
00033                                         end = subject.find_first_of(delims, begin);
00034                                 } else {
00035                                         out.push_back(subject.substr(begin, subject.length() - begin));
00036                                         begin = subject.find_first_not_of(delims, end);
00037                                 }
00038                         } else {
00039                                 break;
00040                         }
00041     }
00042         }
00043 
00044         std::string StrUtils::detokenize(const std::vector<std::string>& in, const std::string& delimiters) {
00045                 if(in.empty())
00046                         return std::string();
00047                 
00048                 std::ostringstream os;
00049                 std::copy(in.begin (), in.end() - 1, 
00050                                                         std::ostream_iterator<std::string>(os, delimiters.c_str()));
00051                 return os.str () + *(in.rbegin());
00052         }
00053 
00054         uint32_t StrUtils::stringToIp(const std::string& ip_str) {
00055                 int32_t oct1, oct2, oct3, oct4;
00056                 uint32_t ip = 0;
00057                 if( 4!=sscanf( ip_str.c_str(), "%d.%d.%d.%d", &oct1, &oct2, &oct3, &oct4 ) ||
00058                                 oct1>255 || oct2>255 || oct3>255 || oct4>255 ||
00059                                 oct1<0   || oct2<0   || oct3<0   || oct4<0   )
00060                 {
00061                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, "Failed to get IP address from string '" << ip_str << "'");
00062                 }
00063                 ip =  ((oct1 << 24)  & 0xFF000000) |
00064                          ((oct2 << 16) & 0x00FF0000) |
00065                          ((oct3 << 8)   & 0x0000FF00) |
00066                         oct4;
00067                 return ip;
00068         }
00069 
00070         std::string StrUtils::ipToString(uint32_t ip) {
00071                 char buf[ 16 ];
00072                 sprintf( buf,"%d.%d.%d.%d",
00073                                                  (ip & 0xFF000000) >> 24,
00074                                                  (ip & 0x00FF0000) >> 16,
00075                                                  (ip & 0x0000FF00) >> 8,
00076                                                  (ip & 0x000000FF));
00077                 return buf;
00078         }
00079 
00080         std::string StrUtils::intToString(int32_t i) {
00081                 char buf[16];
00082                 sprintf(buf, "%d", i);
00083                 return buf;
00084         }
00085 
00086         std::string StrUtils::binaryView(const uint8_t* data, uint32_t len) {
00087                 std::string binStr("0x");
00088                 char byteChars[10];
00089                 for(uint32_t offset = 0; offset < len; offset++){
00090                         sprintf(byteChars,"00%02X",(uint32_t)*(data + offset));
00091                         binStr+= byteChars + strlen(byteChars)-2;
00092                 }
00093                 return binStr;
00094         }
